content: SeedlyTV EP05 Investments REITs ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019How do you feel about Lion-Philips S-REIT ETF or REIT ETF as general? Would you recommend it for people starting out?1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 27 May 2019Skip all the reit ETFs and buy into the individual reits on your own. No point paying more fees for lower yield. The reits in the ETFs are indicated in the fund documents and you can just buy into them.0 comments0
